bool bad() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns {{c|true}} if non-recoverable error has occurred on the associated stream. Specifically, returns {{c|true}} if {{ltt|cpp/io/ios_base/iostate|badbit}} is set in {{c|rdstate()}}.

See {{l2tt|cpp/io/ios_base/iostate}} for the list of conditions that set {{tt|badbit}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|true}} if a non-recoverable error has occurred, {{c|false}} otherwise.
